sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: If you draw one card at random from a standard deck of 52 playing cards, what is the probability that it will be an ace of spades?
message_2:
There is only 1 ace of spades in a standard deck of 52 playing cards. So, the probability of drawing the ace of spades is 1 out of 52.

The probability can be written as a fraction:

Probability = (Number of favorable outcomes) / (Total number of possible outcomes)

Probability = 1/52
